body_html: Overriding repr in a subclass is a pretty standard thing, so I’m quite ambivalent if this is necessary. Also, I believe that if we were to add this then it should be a method rather than an attribute
body_text: Overriding repr in a subclass is a pretty standard thing, so I’m quite ambivalent if this is necessary. Also, I believe that if we were to add this then it should be a method rather than an attribute
body: Overriding __repr__ in a subclass is a pretty standard thing, so I’m quite ambivalent if this is necessary. Also, I believe that if we were to add this then it should be a method rather than an attribute
